themes: loss of funding for established local artists
importance of arts to Austin's cultural identity
need for fair consideration in funding decisions
role of arts in community cohesion during divisive times
call for increased and sustained arts funding
key_phrases: Increase the funding for local artists and established dance, performance, music organizations in Austin
find the money to do that
so many of the artists that have been producing great artistic performance for the Austin community for years have been dropped from receiving funding
arts are such an integral part of the Austin Culture
ensure that all artists get fair consideration
presently we are surrounded by much chaos and divisiveness around the nation
arts bring humanity together even if only for the time of the shared experience
ACME has the power to make sure the arts continue by increasing the funding for all arts
barriers_identified: artists that have been producing great artistic performance for the Austin community for years have been dropped from receiving funding
lack of sufficient funding for local artists and organizations
solutions_proposed: Increase the funding for local artists and established dance, performance, music organizations in Austin
find more money so the arts in Austin stay real
ensure that all artists get fair consideration
